sentence.Network_en: The West has gradually relaxed its hostile attitude to this influential state.
sentence.Network_cn: 西方对这个颇具影响力的国家的敌视态度已逐渐缓和。

sentence.Network_en: He was one of the most influential perfor-mers of modern jazz.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是现代爵士乐最有影响力的表演者之一。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (referring to astral influence): from medieval Latin influentia (see influence)

entry.def: Someone or something that is influential has a lot of influence over people or events.

example.ex: It helps to have influential friends.
example.tran: 有几个位高权重的朋友很有好处。

example.ex: ...the influential position of president of the chamber...
example.tran: 很有影响力的议院议长之位

means.word_mean: 1. having or exercising influence or power;

auth_sentence.content: Now some influential voices are saying more is needed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now some influential voices are saying more is needed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now some influential voices are saying more is needed.

auth_sentence.content: Who was the most influential person in your life?
auth_sentence.res_content: Who was the most influential person in your life?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who was the most influential person in your life?

auth_sentence.content: John Yates was a very powerful and influential officer.
auth_sentence.res_content: John Yates was a very powerful and influential officer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: John Yates was a very powerful and influential officer.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =of,relating to,characterized by…… 表形容词,"关于……的,有……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bene好+fic做+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.[to]有利的,有益的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商业的;商务的;可获利的
stems_affixes.word_buile: commerce商业+ial关于……的,有……的→商业的;商务的
con共同+gen产生+ial关于……的,有……的→产生共同[兴趣]→情投意合的
consequent作为结果的,随之发生的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.产生后果的,重要的
con共同+viv生命+ial关于……的,有……的→共同活跃的→欢乐的
different不同的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.差别的 n.差别,差异;微分
influent流入的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.有影响的,有势力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的
stems_affixes.word_buile: judic审理+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偏狭的,粗俗的;地方性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: province省+ial关于……的,有……的→地方性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发育不全的,退化器官的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vestige退化的器官+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.发育不全的,退化器官的
commerce商业+ial关于……的,有……的→商业的;商务的
different不同的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.差别的 n.差别,差异;微分

Sentence.sentence: An influential figure decided to move from the countryside to the city.
Jack White, the former front man of the White Stripes and an influential figure among fellow musicians, likes to make things difficult for himself.
It is used by a number of influential science journals.

means.word_mean: 有很大影响的,有权势的，有支配力的

sentences.en: He is a very influential man in the government.
sentences.cn: 他在政府中是个很有影响的人物。

sentences.en: The fact is influential in reaching a decision.
sentences.cn: 这一因素对做出决定是有影响的。

jushi.english: He had the support of a powerful and influential politician.
jushi.chinese: 他得到一个有权势的政客的支持。

jushi.english: He is a very influential man in the government.
jushi.chinese: 他在政府中是个很有影响的人物。

jushi.english: They set up an influential committee to advise workers on how to economize in food.
jushi.chinese: 他们成立一个强有力的委员会来劝告工人们节约用粮。
